title: The House on the Moor
description: It was a simple job. Check out the house, see who owned it, knock it down.Now I'm trapped there. Now I can see why the house has stood vacant for so long.Now I can see why it can never be knocked down. Now I can see what hides in the mist.But the bulldozers are coming, and there's nothing I can do...
author: Shaun Allan
